info.name: HRMS API Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for HRMS (Human Resource Management System)

## Setup Instructions
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Create an environment with variable `base_url` = `http://localhost:8000`
3. Run 'Sign In' request first to get auth token
4. Token will be automatically saved to environment

## Authentication
All protected endpoints use Bearer token authentication.
